sub_title: Marketing Lead at Cevinio (AP Automation SaaS Solution)
summary:
Creative & Innovative Digital Marketing Specialist with over 6 years of professional experience. 
I have developed my career in social media, content marketing, brand building & positioning, influencers & affiliate marketing, and more. Originally from Spain, today I am located in the Netherlands while able to deliver results remotely. 

Currently, I am taking on the next step in my career as a MarCom lead at Cevinio, an AP automation SaaS solution. In my role, I am responsible for the creation and execution of our marketing and business development strategies. I ensure that our business is brought to the attention of existing and potential customers on brand using various online and offline marketing and communication tools.

Just before, I worked as Global Brand Content Specialist for strollers for the brands Maxi-Cosi and Quinny. I was responsible for supporting new product introductions with the right digital content. Next to this, I managed Quinny's global social media channels, from strategy to community management; global influencer initiatives supporting local activations, and I was co-leading digital innovations for our brands: in 2020 we activated several innovations on social media that improved brand awareness, consideration, and conversion. 

Day to day I put to work my creative skills orienting my work to be efficient, data-driven, research-based, and aligned with the business objectives. My goal is to improve our performance through the customer journey by activating the right digital communications. This allows us to better invest our sources while ensuring we collect the desired results. 

Regarding my education, I have a dual bachelor's degree in Communication & PR and Marketing from CEU University in Spain. In 2016 I earned the final bachelor's degree award as the best student of marketing. I own a masters in SEO, and over the past years, I have done several courses on digital marketing and influencers. I am currently studying Facebook Blueprint in Creative Strategy. 

You will meet a strategic and analytical digital communication specialist, with outstanding creative skills, flexibility, and resilience. I can work in fast-paced environments while being able to prioritize, multitask, and manage a high workload. I am an adaptable professional with a positive and can-do attitude, able to motivate and inspire others. I would also highlight my entrepreneurial mindset and ability to work independently as well as on a team.

awards.title: Premio Excelencia Academica Final de Grado
awards.description: El Premio a la Excelencia Academica Final de Grado 2016 es un reconocimiento por el esfuerzo realizado durantes los años de estudios. Los parametros van más allá del rendimiento teórico valorando la implicación, la participación y la motivación por nuestro campo de estudio.

projects.title: OXYGEN
projects.description:
Oxygen es bienestar, el lujo de la naturaleza y la pureza. Es reinvención, materializada en piezas de mobiliario sostenible, de diseño y de alta calidad.

“MÁS ALLÁ DE CREAR MOBILIARIO DE LUJO SOSTENIBLE, QUEREMOS COMPARTIR NUESTRO SUEÑO DE FUTURO”

EN OXYGEN SABEMOS QUE EL VERDADERO LUJO RADICA EN LOS RECURSOS NATURALES DE LOS QUE DISPONEMOS. ¿LA RAZÓN? NO DURARÁN PARA SIEMPRE. NUESTRO OBJETIVO ES EMPLEAR INNOVACIÓN Y DISEÑO PARA CREAR MOBILIARIO DE LUJO SOSTENIBLE DE FORMA ARTESANAL. EVOLUCIONAMOS ASÍ HACIA EL LUJO EMOCIONAL, EL CUAL PONE EN VALOR LA SOSTENIBILIDAD Y LA RIQUEZA DE LA TIERRA.

TENEMOS EL COMPROMISO DE CUIDAR EL AIRE QUE RESPIRAMOS.

contributors.headline: Marketing Lead at Cevinio (AP Automation SaaS Solution)
Customer Service Process Improvement and Contact Center Leader at LG Electronics
Master in Big Data Science | Inhouse Consultant | MSc Industrial Engineering | MSc International Leadership
Procesos y eficiencia | Master Visual Analytics & Big Data | Python | Power BI

profile_positions.description:
As the Marketing Lead at Cevinio, I am responsible for bringing our solutions closer to our target audience and driving engagement to impact revenue growth through various online and offline marketing and communication tools. My key tasks and responsibilities include:

• Website optimization for search engines and up-to-date content management.
• Developing and executing a content strategy that includes video, whitepapers, and other formats.
• Organizing participation in external events, both in-person and online, as well as our own event and webinar agenda.
• Managing social media advertising campaigns and SEA.
• Developing and executing email marketing campaigns that drive engagement and revenue growth.
• Identifying new business opportunities and markets that align with Cevinio's goals and values.
• Management of CRM for marketing and sales.
• Ensure our company communications are on brand.
• Social Media from strategy to analytics.
• Measure the performance of marketing and communication activities for continuous improvement.

Working closely with the sales team to ensure marketing activities align with business goals and drive leads and conversions.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Lead

profile_positions.description:
As Global Brand Content Specialist with special focus on digital my tasks can be grouped into three main areas:

• Brand Communications:
Collaboration with different teams and agencies for new product communication campaign plans and content creation. 
Support multi-channel campaign development and execution.
Track trends within millennial parents, competitive landscape and digital world.

• Social Media:
Optimize social media channel mix.
Maximize the engagement and reach of social media content by leading the content creation process and being on top of relevant trends.
Global distribution of social media content.
Development and execution of social media posting strategy.
Maintaining and management of global content calendar for all social media channels.
Collaboration with the different teams and agencies for execution.
Deliver communication counsel to internal executives on both short and long-term challenges and opportunities.

• Influencer management and e-PR:
Development of global strategy for product placement in cooperation with influencers.
Support local influencer activations.

Follow us!! #Quinny #WalkYourWay 🙆🙆‍♂️👶
>> Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/quinnyworld/
>> Pinterest: https://nl.pinterest.com/quinnyworld/
>> Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Quinny/
>> Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/quinnytv
profile_positions.title: Global Brand Digital Content Specialist  Strollers | Maxi-Cosi & Quinny

profile_positions.description:
As a Communications specialist I was responsible for:

• Marketing Communications (main focus on digital marketing):
Support communication strategy and execution ensuring the growth of a strong digital presence across platforms.
Up-to-date web content strategies and executions.
Implementing proper SEO and development of SEM campaigns.
Content development and execution.
Track web analytics and campaign performance.

• Social Media:
B2B social media strategy across channels.
Management of content calendar.
Development and execution of social media content keeping a close eye on engagement and effectiveness.

• PR and e-PR:
Develop media strategies through professional magazines and media.
Organization of events and activities of different natures, from international trade-shows all over the world to internal events.

Others.
Collaborating with sales to carry out B2B strategies and actions.
Working together with HR on talent attraction programs and activities to improve the internal atmosphere.
profile_positions.title: Communications Specialist

profile_positions.description: As a Communication and Marketing Intern at UNESCO Valencia, I was in charge of managing social networks, event planning, and PR mainly. It was the first time I worked in an NGO and it was a really rewarding experience. As a result of this culture and social experience, I have a complete perspective on how another kind of structures works.
profile_positions.title: Internship Marketing & Communication

profile_positions.description:
I joined KUOMBO in my last year in Advertising and PR with the aim of improving and practicing what I had learned. I worked as a copywriter and as a result, I learned about content marketing, scheduling and posting articles, manage social networks, SEO analysis and SEO writing, doing SEM ads, email marketing and so on. 
KUOMBO is an e-commerce company which offers its services to different kind of industries and companies, for this reason, it was a really good experience. I not only learned about the tasks above but also I felt how is work with different customers at the same time.
profile_positions.title: Internship Junior Copywriter

profile_positions.description:
A few years ago, The Banco Santander developed a "special plan" with the purpose of connecting students and small companies. I applied to that plan in order to start my professional path as well as start to get some experience. Fortunately, I got it. 
I worked as a communication trainee at Llumy, a B2B oriented company with a special business unit for the retail market. My main responsibilities there were helping with the marketing and communication plan, assisting the owners with their new website, from content to design, and managing social networks
profile_positions.title: Internship Digital Marketing
